message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $12,000. I believe this product will be highly valuable to you, and this offer represents a great opportunity to acquire it.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to me.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value the product at a higher price point. Would you consider $11,000? I'm confident this would be a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I place on the product.
